column7: there was a traffic accident between a VIP bus and motorbike along National Road 5
column11: Battambang province.------The Virak Buntham ownerd vehicle
column13: hit a 67-year-old man and a 63-year-old female passenger
column15: the victims were riding a motorcycle from the west and were turning left when the bus hit them from the rear
column16: causing the death and serious injury.------The bus then left the road and overturned down the embankment------No information on the bus passengers or driver is known. ------POST NEWS
